abstract: If Ralcorp does not begin deal talks by 5 p.m. on Monday, ConAgra says it will withdraw its $94-a-share takeover offer.
snippet: If Ralcorp does not begin deal talks by 5 p.m. on Monday, ConAgra says it will withdraw its $94-a-share takeover offer.
lead_paragraph: After months of unsuccessfully trying to persuade Ralcorp to accept several takeover proposals, ConAgra on Tuesday set a Monday deadline  for the food company to accept its $5.2 billion merger bid.

headline.main: ConAgra Gives Ralcorp a Deadline to Accept Its Offer

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
